pages.title: The Kobolediator
pages.text: You'll find the Kobolediator right next to the Wadjet and the Ancient Remnant. Before getting the heart container, you'll need to slay all of:$(li)The Amethyst Crab$(li)The Wadjet$(li)The Kobolediator$(li)The Prowler$(li)The Ender Golem$(li)The Aptrgangr$(li)The Clawdian
